fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**OK I PULL UP**- Visit a playerâ€™s house to immediately become friends with them. They now win with you
**Boogie**- Stay home and throw an after party. All visits against you will fail and everyone there will now win with you

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Lovable**- Any attacker that targets you will have their attack fail and they will now win with you
**Internet Famous**- Due to your abundance on the internet, you and your legacy cannot die, including hanging, modkilling, and any form of removal from the game

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have every living player win with you before the game ends
